name: Mystery Mess
description:
Mystery Mess is a collect the clues and guess the culprit game.

Go Through all the places and collect the clues, then talk to the people

to find the culprit. After When you think you know who don it.

First you need to talk to all the people, then head over to the Home

and click done. Have fun.

Controls

Use Mouse to click

Font

by vernon adams (vern@newtypography.co.uk),

"Amatic" "Amatic Bold" and "Amatic Regular"
